eshmun.gui.kripke.utils.graphphysics

Class Vector

  • java.lang.Object
    • eshmun.gui.kripke.utils.graphphysics.Vector

  • public class Vector
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a Vector class, used as a utility class for the graph physics.
    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Mohammad Ali Beydoun

      • normalize

        public Vector normalize()
        Computes a normalized version of this vector.
        Returns:
